dict.string: This app requires location access to detect nearby devices via Bluetooth
This app requires location access to detect nearby devices via Bluetooth even when the app is in the background
This app requires location access to detect nearby devices via Bluetooth
This app requires access to local network services to discover and connect to nearby devices.
This app requires location access to detect nearby devices via Bluetooth
This app uses Bluetooth to communicate with nearby devices
This app requires access to Bluetooth to connect with nearby devices
